txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Fading Essences from the shades in the Great River region. Collect them and deliver them to a task-board in Great River to earn favour with the Riders of Stangard.
You have turned in the fading essences for a modest reward at the local task-board.
You have not yet collected enough fading essences to complete your task.
Riders of Stangard Task: Fading Essences
The Rohirrim of Stangard have posted a task to collect fading essences from shades. They can be turned in at any task-board in Great River.
Deliver the fading essences to any task-board in Great River.
You have accepted a task to acquire fading essences.
Wanted: Fading Essences from the shades in the Great River region.
